hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Do not deny your fathers (i.e. claim to be the sons of persons other than your fathers), and whoever denies his father, is charged with disbelief

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنِ ادَّعَى إِلَى غَيْرِ أَبِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever claims to be the son of a person other than his father
